sentences.cn: 美味可口的巧克力蛋糕

sentences.en: Magazines deoted to home management, such as Good Housekeeping and Family Circle, are chock - full scrumptious selections.
sentences.cn: 一般理家杂志, 如[好管家]及[家庭圈]都满满地刊载很多美味的精选食谱.

sentences.en: Magazines devoted to home management, such as Good Housekeeping and Family Circle arechock - full of scrumptious selections.
sentences.cn: 一般理家杂志, 如《好管家》及《家庭圈》都满满地刊载很多美味的精选食谱.

sentences.en: Magazines devoted to home management, such as Good Housekeeping and Family Circle, are chock - full scrumptious selections.
sentences.cn: 一般理家杂志, 如[好管家]及[家子圈]都满满地刊载很多美味的精选食谱.

sentences.en: May I have another helping of that scrumptious salad?
sentences.cn: 我可以再吃一客那道美味的色拉 吗 ?

sentences.en: There are delicious, happy sniffs and scrumptious snacks to share.
sentences.cn: 有美妙, 幸福的气息跟美味可口的点心与你一起分享.

sentences.en: Those scrumptious chocolates are so hard to resist.
sentences.cn: 这些令人垂涎三尺的巧克力令人难以抗拒。
我们吃了一顿很棒的午餐.

sentences.en: While sipping his sangria, he noticed a sizzling, scrumptious - looking platter being served at the next table.
sentences.cn: 品尝着香格里亚酒(注), 他注意到一盘热吱吱, 看起来香喷喷的菜被端上邻桌.

trans.tran_en: food that is scrumptious tastes very good
